attributes.action: get us on the new eastate tobe put on green cab from exchange lines..for fttc
attributes.additional_details: i have been in touch with btopenreach for 2 years and they want us to co-fund it, but the rest of main road has been enabled apart from the new houses on the same road but on the new eastate , one of the flats on the same eastate has been put on a green cab , as the rest of us on the eastate dont think this is fair , why should one person have fibre and not the rest of the eastate , why should we pay for  us tobe put onto it, the exchange is that close i can see it.. if u agree please sign this.
attributes.background: hiya like alot of us on new eastates under 10 years old , we have problems being put onto future tech which is fibre optic , we on the new eastate main road hoo and mercian road hoo , have exchange only lines and were not put onto a green cabernet hence we cant get fttc fibre broadband..

rejection.details:
Not the Government/Parliament’s responsibility

We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. BT is a private company and the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for its operation or the operations of other service providers. 

You can find out about complaining about BT here:

http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/10789/~/how-do-i-make-a-complaint-to-bt%3F
